id: Build With Me: Time Blocking Notion Template
name: Build With Me: Time Blocking Notion Template
description: Enter code TBLOCK100 to get this for FREE. We do this to prevent bots from accessing all of our templates. Although it's free, we'd also greatly appreciate any donations to continue doing this ❤️Welcome to our Time Blocking Notion Template (+ Build With Me Tutorial)We designed this template to teach you how to use and build Notion pages! This template will guide you through how to make a time-blocking page. We will be showing how to use formulas to show the time-blocked schedule.What's Included?
features: Video on How to Build; Pre-built Time Blocking Notion Template
